resources.string: %1$s treats users\' privacy seriously. We will NEVER collect any data like passwords or credit card numbers.
Search GIFs by text or emoji
You need to activate %1$s to use this theme.
%1$s provides you with personalized keyboard themes and cute emojis.
EmojiKey - Color your keyboard with personalized themes, Gifs and fonts.

"Turn 'ON' the switch on the top right. ↗️⊙.⊙↗️ With accessibility authorization, you'll get the best typing experience on different apps!
Note: You may receive a system reminder about authorizing, Emoji Keyboard will NEVER collect ANY of your information."
Customize your own keyboard with your favorite pictures! Download #%1$s For Free:\n https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartkeyboard.emoji
